tygenco 160910016334 "2017-05-21 14:45:00 GMT" https://tygenco.tumblr.com/post/160910016334/a-man-mansplained-linguistics-to-me "dollopheadclotpole:   I’m currently doing a PhD in linguistics. I have a BA and MA degree in linguistics. I am being funded by one of only seven research councils in the UK and was offered funding by another too.   Yesterday at a party I had to listen to a guy
column2: who has never studied linguistics
column3: tell me how women talk far more than men and “dominate” conversations.   Even when I tried to present him with studies that show that men typically hold 75% of conversations
column4: will view a woman as dominating if she takes up more than 25% of the  conversation
column5: and interrupt far more frequently than women
column6: he would just talk over me to tell me all about how women talk too much.   He actually said at one point “women just talk loads and say nothing. Men don’t have to say much because we can just get our point across without the chat”.   All while he was giving me his opinion and refusing to listen to anything I had to say based on my 5 years of linguistic knowledge and 24 years of experience as a woman.   I mean…   " False text

column1: tygenco 160896807859 "2017-05-21 04:21:05 GMT" https://tygenco.tumblr.com/post/160896807859/jenniferrpovey-fandomsandfeminism "jenniferrpovey:  fandomsandfeminism:  sculptingsuccess:  triggeredmedia:  a-path-beyond84:  triggeredmedia:  A commie just suggested universal basic income won’t increase laziness and entitlements and doesn’t require taking from others against their will.  I am in top 10% of salaries. I would quit my job tomorrow with any UBI $1k a month or more. Some liberals are asking for $4k/mo. They believe UBI is actually feasible. That it would not destroy the American economy completely.  I’d quit my job also for $1k/mo.  Two roomies on $2k/mo can live reasonably well
column2: especially when you consider that major work related expenses would be gone.  A family of 4 would make $48k/year tax free. To do nothing. @fandomsandfeminism thinks it should be $4k/mo.  A family of 4 would clear $192k/year tax free TO DO NOTHING. This is who fucking stupid people on the left are. SHE CLAIMS THIS IS THE MINIMUM NEEDED TO SURVIVE.  This is why she blocked me. She knows how fucking greedy and insane she is.  Who would anyone ever work?  In order to pay something along the lines of $12/trillion a year to all americans there would be a tax rate of 80%. ON TOP OF EXISTING TAXES.  Let’s pretend its just 80%. You would have to get paid $240k/year to make $48k after taxes.  No one would work jobs like burger flippers and sewage for $0 additional money. If you made $10/hr to do nothing would you work a 40 hour grueling job to make make $15/hr? So burger flippers would have to get paid in the area of $480k a year to justify even working compared to doing nothing make doing nothing.  They think all of this could be done without inflation.    This is how fucking stupid the left is.   Someone tag @fandomsandfeminism   She needs a math lesson.     @fandomsandfeminism ^thoughts Lazy people admitting that they would be lazy.  Like
column3: you would actually stop working if you didn’t have the threat of starvation hanging over you? Well
column4: a lot of us would seek out fulfilling non-exploitative work. And for the record
column5: I blocked that jackass above for repeated harassment
column6: so maybe don’t tag me with his shit. Basic Income.Org Thinking Utopian: How about a universal basic income? The Economic Case for a Universal Basic Income (Part 1 of a series) How Universal Basic Income Will Save Us From the Robot Uprising Thanks.   And the only studies done on UBI indicated that the only people who quit work were those with more important things to do. Like
column9: or nursing babies. The other thing this person misses: Robots can flip burgers. Robots can make reasonably decent burritos. It won’t be long before taxi drivers can be replaced by self driving cars. How are people going to survive if there are no jobs to be had. If your answer is: They don’t then you are supporting the end of our civilization
column10: because once unemployment hits a certain level and hunger hits a certain level
column11: then a violent revolution becomes pretty damn inevitable. Also
column12: when calculating how to pay for UBI
column13: then consider this: 1. The money saved by not having to decide who is eligible for welfare (disability is a slightly different matter
column14: because disabled people have higher living costs and may require some system of grants/allowances). UBI would replace unemployment benefits
column17: etc. 2. The studies done on UBI demonstrate that health care costs drop
column18: primarily due to reductions in drug/alcohol abuse
column20: mental health costs in general and road traffic accidents (apparently people who aren’t worried about their survival drive more safely). SOME people are going to be lazy. Some people are always going to be lazy. Most people want to be doing something productive with their lives. (Now
column21: I can’t actually support myself and my husband on 2k/month because of the CoL here. I would need something like 4k
column22: because 2k is typical rent for a one bedroom in this area. I’m lucky mine’s a bit cheaper. Any basic income amount would have to be locally determined and flexible over time). Oh
column23: and UBI is not a communist concept. " False text

column1: tygenco 160875110384 "2017-05-20 15:17:03 GMT" https://tygenco.tumblr.com/post/160875110384/artbytesslyn-comic-poison-ivy-in-the-last-15 "artbytesslyn:  Comic Poison Ivy in the last 15 years: Hey you know
column2: the whole man-hating evil seductress trope is kinda old and disrespectful and it’s time to recognize the potential of this complex and interesting character. We’ll focus on making her more sympathetic and less crazy. We’ll show she has a deep
column3: real
column4: and profound connection to the earth. We’ll show that she is struggling to maintain her humanity in light of a darkening situation and that she still feels compassion for human life
column5: as it is also part of the earth. She will only apathetically kill people who are 100% irredeemable. She will have many moments in which she spares human life. She will have many complicated relationships with other women in the Universe
column12: and many others. These relationships will range from uneasy trust or anger to understanding and love. She will not show romantic interest in men and will not be a sexually driven character. She will be a member of many hero teams
column13: including the Birds of Prey and the Justice League
column14: even if there are missteps in the writing of the character. Most of the Bat-family will recognize Ivy as a grey-area case that must be handled on an individual basis and will acknowledge that her situation is centered around tragedy and loss of self. They will recognize that Ivy could very well be the thing the saves the entire planet. They will recognize that Arkham is making her worse
column15: and will do what they can to reason with her.  Wonder Woman will acknowledge that the Green and Mother Gaia chose Ivy as her protector and that she was wise to do so. (Sensation Comics #31) Batgirl will show numerous moments of concern and understanding and will even acknowledge that if they were in another world
column16: their relationship would be very different. She will value Ivy’s powers as a source of good and believes Ivy’s struggle stems from the flawed nature of humanity. (Batgirl Annual #2
column17: various) Batman will return to Ivy to ask her for help
column18: knowing that when the world is at stake
column19: she is a trustworthy ally to the Earth. (Swamp Thing) (Sensation Comics) (Detective Comics
column20: various) (Justice League United) (Animal Man) There will be many moments where the relationship between the part of Ivy that is still human and the part that is the Green struggle to cooperate or have complexities in their natures. (Cycle of Life and Death) (No Man’s Land) (Birds of Prey) Harley Quinn will express implicit love for Ivy and in certain series
column21: they will be in a canon loving relationship. This will not be subtext as it has been in the past. We will show an actual relationship between two women that isn’t just for eyecandy. (Harley Quinn series) (Bombshells) Yes
column22: there will be missteps in the canon as many different hands are working between many different series
column23: but overall the character will have undergone a complete transformation that far exceeds the previous incarnations. Every Media Outside of Comics
column24: obsessed with an Ivy that hasn’t existed prominently in 15 years: u know
column25: the slutty evil plant lady? " False text

column1: tygenco 161003073954 "2017-05-24 00:41:07 GMT" https://tygenco.tumblr.com/post/161003073954/stones-have-been-popping-out-of-people-who-ride "beowulf22121: nudityandnerdery:  kawuli:  kawuli:  kawuli:  1. Doctor finds anecdotal evidence that people are passing kidney stones after riding on Big Thunder Mountain Railroad at Disney World 2. Doctor makes 3-D model of kidney
column2: complete with stones and urine (his own)
column3: takes it on Big Thunder Mountain Railroad 60 times 3. “The stones passed 63.89 percent of the time while the kidneys were in the back of the car. When they were in the front
column4: the passage rate was only 16.67 percent. That’s based on only 60 rides on a single coaster
column5: and Wartinger guards his excitement in the journal article: ‘Preliminary study findings support the anecdotal evidence that a ride on a moderate-intensity roller coaster could benefit some patients with small kidney stones.’” 4. “Some rides are going to be more advantageous for some patients than other rides. So I wouldn’t say that the only ride that helps you pass stones is Big Thunder Mountain. That’s grossly inaccurate.” 5. “His advice for now: If you know you have a stone that’s smaller than five millimeters
column6: riding a series of roller coasters could help you pass that stone before it gets to an obstructive size and either causes debilitating colic or requires a $10
column7: 000 procedure to try and break it up. And even once a stone is broken up using shock waves
column8: tiny fragments and “dust” remain that need to be passed. The coaster could help with that
column9: too.” SCIENCE: IT WORKS  Update:  “In all
column10: we used 174 kidney stones of varying shapes
column11: sizes and weights to see if each model worked on the same ride and on two other roller coasters
column12: ” Wartinger said. “Big Thunder Mountain was the only one that worked. We tried Space Mountain and Aerosmith’s Rock ‘n’ Roller Coaster and both failed.”Wartinger went on to explain that these other rides are too fast and too violent with a G-force that pins the stone into the kidney and doesn’t allow it to pass.“The ideal coaster is rough and quick with some twists and turns
column13: but no upside down or inverted movements
column14: ” he said. MSU Today  I just love this because it’s HILARIOUS and yet also a perfect archetypal example of The Scientific Method: 1. Hypothesis 2. Experiment 3. Results 4. Discussion  5. Conclusions 6. GOTO 1 (the scientific method is iterative
column16: but get back to me when my insurance will cover park admission.  Park Admission is below my deductible anyway. " False link

column1: tygenco 159599342714 "2017-04-15 12:22:28 GMT" https://tygenco.tumblr.com/post/159599342714/a-biology-teacher-just-destroyed-every-excuse-for "sentinelviktorcullen:  prettyaveragewhiteshark:  This is AMAZING. The teacher’s rebuttal:  I just commented this on a transphobic post that was all like
column2: “In a sexual species
column3: females have two X chromosomes and males have an X and a Y
column4: I’m not a bigot it’s just science.” I’m a science teacher so I responded with this. First of all
column6: you can have females be XX and males be X (insects)
column7: you can have females be ZW and males be ZZ (birds)
column8: you can have females be females because they developed in a warm environment and males be males because they developed in a cool environment (reptiles)
column9: you can have females be females because they lost a penis sword fighting contest (some flatworms)
column10: you can have males be males because they were born female
column11: but changed sexes because the only male in their group died (parrotfish and clownfish)
column12: you can have males look and act like females because they are trying to get close enough to actual females to mate with them (cuttlefish
column15: or you can be one of thousands of sexes (slime mold
column17: did you mean humans? Oh ok then. You can be male because you were born female
column18: but you have 5-alphareductase deficiency and so you grew a penis at age 12. You can be female because you have an X and a Y chromosome but you are insensitive to androgens
column19: and so you have a female body. You can be female because you have an X and a Y chromosome but your Y is missing the SRY gene
column20: and so you have a female body. You can be male because you have two X chromosomes
column21: but one of your X’s HAS an SRY gene
column22: and so you have a male body. You can be male because you have two X chromosomes- but also a Y. You can be female because you have only one X chromosome at all. And you can be male because you have two X chromosomes
column23: but your heart and brain are male. And vice - effing - versa. Don’t use science to justify your bigotry. The world is way too weird for that shit.   Addressing this to the TERF that assaulted me. " False link
